word:
I cannot now consider this history further; but I ask you, in every city, in every town, in every household, I ask every individual to study the lesson of this scripture, bearing in mind the words of inspiration, "Let him that thinketh he standeth take heed lest he fall" [1 Corinthians 10:12]. Here is presented the only 


                                     -113- 

election that is brought to view in the Word of God. It is those who take heed lest they fall that will be accepted at last.
